caption: Relating to the creation of a small non-road engine purchase incentive program under the Texas emissions reduction plan.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill establishes a small non-road engine purchase incentive program in Texas, providing financial incentives up to 80% of the cost for purchasing electric or alternative technology engines under 25 horsepower and related batteries. The program aims to reduce emissions and improve air quality. While the bill does not specifically target Chinese immigrants, it applies to all persons in Texas regardless of nationality who make eligible purchases.

中文摘要：
该法案在德克萨斯州设立小型非道路发动机购买激励计划，为购买25马力以下的电动或替代技术发动机及相关电池提供最高80%的财政补贴。该计划旨在减少排放并改善空气质量。虽然该法案并未特别针对中国移民，但适用于在德克萨斯州所有符合条件的购买者，不论国籍。

Most likely committees:
1. Environmental Regulation Committee
2. Energy Resources Committee
3. Natural Resources Committee
